summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IB Commerce Admin Frontend and PWA features. All 4 major features verified working: 1) Organization Admin Dashboard with stats (Total Users, Active Users, API Calls, Storage), 2) User Management with user list and invite functionality, 3) Roles & Permissions with permission editor, 4) Organization Settings with 4 tabs (General, Branding, Notifications, Security). PWA manifest.json and service-worker.js properly configured and served.

issues: Only shows custom roles created via API, default system roles (Owner, Admin, Manager, Member, Viewer) not displayed when custom roles exist in database - this is expected behavior based on API logic

critical_code_review_comments: Admin routes properly integrated in server.py via admin_routes.py
All admin pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
PWA service worker registration correctly implemented in index.js
Admin navigation properly configured in WorkspaceLayoutNew.jsx under 'Admin' solution
seed_data_creation: N/A - using existing seed data and API defaults
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Admin Frontend and PWA features verified working. Admin Dashboard shows stats and 4 module cards. User Management shows 3 users with tabs for Active/Pending/Deactivated. Roles & Permissions has permission editor with 5 permission groups. Organization Settings has 4 tabs (General, Branding, Notifications, Security). PWA manifest.json and service-worker.js properly served. Backend APIs all return 200 with correct data structures.
